short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows clipboard read and write without user interaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that allows clipboard read and write without user interaction. Normally Chrome does not allow JavaScript access to the Clipboard without a user interaction (e.g. click). AllowClipboard extension can be useful in situations where clipboard access is needed out of band, such as during an asynchronous method call from the server.
